prompts: Create a Pokemon that resembles a dessert with a unique twist and a whimsical design.
Imagine a bug-type Pokemon with a playful personality and a creative appearance.
Design a Pokemon that combines elements of nature and urban life in a quirky way.
Generate a Pokemon that has features resembling a pastry, with a touch of elegance.

Give me a visual of a Pokemon with a mix of colors reminiscent of autumn and a playful demeanor.
Make a Pokemon that looks like it came straight from a whimsical bakery with a charming personality.
